name: DODGE (itch)
description:
A simple game I (Diordnas) made in about four days to see if it was possible for me to make a game. Turns out it is possible!

In the game you control a Jet fighter, trying to avoid and destroy the endlessly spawning missiles, by dodging them, or making them hit the walls or each other.

Controls:

  • Click to accelerate towards the mouse
  • Spacebar to try again

Should work on any system, by adjusting the resolution and graphics settings in the launcher.

Made in Unity, using Unity's Post-Processing Stack, and the free EZ Camera Shake asset from the Unity Asset store.

If you find a bug or a have suggestion, leave a comment and I'll do my best to fix it, or you could share your high score!
